original_text: Also, they have done these things against me: They made my holy place unclean. At the same time, they did not obey my rules for Sabbath days. Also, they have done these things against me: They made my holy place unclean. At the same time, they did not obey my rules for Sabbath days.
korean_text: 이 외에도 그들이 내게 행한 것이 있나니 당일에 내 성소를 더럽히며 내 안식일을 범하였도다

sentences.original_text: Also, they have done these things against me:
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그들이 내게 이러한 일을 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: They made my holy place unclean.
At the same time, they did not obey my rules for Sabbath days.
sentences.korean_translation: 동시에 그들은 나의 안식일 규례를 준행하지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Also, they have done these things against me:
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그들이 내게 이러한 일을 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: They made my holy place unclean.
At the same time, they did not obey my rules for Sabbath days.
sentences.korean_translation: 동시에 그들은 나의 안식일 규례를 준행하지 아니하였으며
